item.title: Migrated to Hugo
item.description:
After several days of painstaking work, I finally moved from WordPress to Hugo.

Due to the fact that my server is very slow, I think I can focus on writing offline and concentrate on content, rather than adjusting features.

There are many features that I find unnecessary, such as commentator ranking. The tree map of categories is also not that useful, because itâ€™s hard to maintain the database. After switching to Hugo to manage my posts, I can organize them more easily.

item.title: Digitization
item.description: I will try to digitize all of my diaries. Itâ€™s a very big project.

item.title: Writing freely
item.description:
Now I find my writing skill is gradually improving. My writing speed is faster than before. The problem is that I face some stress when I need to post publicly. Iâ€™m still afraid of showing the errors and flaws of my article.
But I know no one can be perfect. Modifying the article and checking the grammar incessantly will kill the interest and motivation of writing.
In addition, Itâ€™s my own website. I think if other people donâ€™t like, they can unfollow me.
In any case, I will try our best to practice more and share my thoughts which I think valuable.

item.title: Harm from technology
item.description: In my opinion, the real harmful radiation is from the devices in our daily life. When we are using our smartphone or other electronic tools, itâ€™s possible to be exposed to radiation. Some people think the radition from phone is not enough to cause negative effect to our body. I take a sceptical attitude.

item.title: EP 14 Information quality
item.description:
In my own opinion, there are three kinds of information in our life.
The first one is text, the second is audio, the last one is video.
Letâ€™s talk about the first one. The content of texts is based on words. Itâ€™s the most abstract form of information. If we are literate, we can understand words, then we can understand road signs, posters, magazines, and books. Itâ€™s simplest to save texts for us. Itâ€™s also a form that can save the best information quality. But itâ€™s maybe the hardest information to understand. Books contain the deepest information quality.
Audio is another kind of information, itâ€™s based on sounds. Itâ€™s more natural to us because we can use our ear to understand. But we canâ€™t control the speed of understanding. We probably also receive some useless information.
The third one is video. It combines sound and image. We can understand it very well, but itâ€™s more shallow. Normally, information quality of video is not that good.

item.title: Healthy food
item.description: Healthy food: Salmon, saurekrout, pecan, olive oil, (cod) liver, arugula, hamburger meat. These foods have the highest nutrients.

item.title: EP 13 Anki and offline
item.description:
I had been using Anki as my reviewing tool from 2017.
Anki is a very powerful and effective tool, itâ€™s also one of the best tools for learning a language. There is also no alternative of Anki as a tool for creating your own database.

But I gradually felt its disadvantages. Itâ€™s a software. I always need to use it on computer or on smartphone. To form a habit, I need to open it everyday.

item.title: Communication
item.description: Communication is necessary in our life. Reading is also a form of communication. When Iâ€™m reading, it just like Iâ€™m talking with the author.

item.title: EP 12 Repetition
item.description:
Repetition is an essential part in our life.
Life is started from one cell. But just by copying itself, one cell can grow into a complicate system with different features. Itâ€™s a form of repetition.

When we need to memorize something, we aIso need a lot of repetitions. Maybe itâ€™s very boring, but I canâ€™t deny itâ€™s a very effective way.
When we need to gain a skill, we also need a lot of repetitions. We usually started from a very basic practice. Only after enough times of practice, we can learn more advanced skill.
At first, even a basic skill is challenging to us, After enough repetition, it will become more and more easier. Then based on this skill there can growing more advanced skills.

item.title: Cash
item.description: I bought a wallet and started using cash again recently. Itâ€™s a very interesting try. Iâ€™ve been getting used to pay by smartphone for many years. Itâ€™s feeling weird after suddenly giving up E-pay. But now I found that I can still be relaxed when I going out without smartphone. When I was paying, the feeling of â€œtouching moneyâ€ is very authentic. Compare with just tapping on the phone, I prefer the feeling of real money.

item.title: EP 11 Pure writing
item.description:
Writing is a essential part in the life of thinking and learning. Itâ€™s also indispensible for me.
But the way of writing has changed a lot. Writing on paper is the most traditional way.
I can still vaguely remember the days when I was writing journal on paper under the dim light of lamp. I enjoyed the feeling of writing on paper.
But itâ€™s very inconvenient to write on paper. We canâ€™t take all of our notebooks easily. Itâ€™s also difficult to look up former words.
I started writing on note-taking apps in 2016. Itâ€™s really convenient and solved the former problems.
There are a lot of features on noke-taking apps. We can change the style and font of notes. We can insert images, audios, even attachments of any formatâ€¦
But in recent years I realized I spent so much time on the features of the software. It created a lot of difficulties to saving and sharing. Another problem is that, note-taking app is installed on electronic devices. Phones and computers contains more features and notifcations. Now I think this way of writing also has its negative effect. It will create a lot of distractions.
Recently I started writing in plain text. I can write in any note-taking softwares. Using special device for writing is also a good idea.

item.title: Switched to Windows
item.description:
I donâ€™t need to be too stubborn and stick to the Linux. Tools are used for improving efficiency instead of for playing. Some ideas are not so that important.
Windows is very powerful now especially after the coming of Android Subsystem. On Linux, I canâ€™t find a similar software as stable as Subsystem. Waydroid and Genymotion have a lot of problems.

item.title: EP 10 Temporary guest
item.description:
Recently I was organizing my contact information. I found a lot of people I havenâ€™t contacted in a long time. As time goes by, they disappear from my life and never reappear. Itâ€™s as if they died even though I have their information. Each of them is like a temporary guest. I donâ€™t know if there will be a chance for us to meet in the future.

Iâ€™m gradually able to start a new relationship. But at the moment I still donâ€™t have the ability to reconnect with old people, but Iâ€™m trying my best. I feel that many people donâ€™t have this ability because of embarrassment. We just let these relationships die one by one. I donâ€™t want to be isolated, so to avoid that situation, I also have to overcome my fear.

item.title: Cashflow E-Game
item.description:
Based on the recommendation from Rich Dadâ€™s book, I try to install the Cashflow game. But the desktop version of E-Game is difficult to install now. I tried my best to install it successfully in VirtualBox.

For the past few months, I have been playing the Cashflow 101 e-game. I have gradually become proficient at it. Itâ€™s very educational and Iâ€™ve gained some knowledge about cash. These days I started to try Cashflow 202. Itâ€™s more complicated compared to the 101 edition.

item.title: EP 9 Technical breakdown
item.description:
Last week I went through a serious problem of my server, on which my website runs.
It started with the problem of the version of PHP. The edition of the current PHP is very old and it couldnâ€™t support the running of some plugins. Then I tried to install a new version of PHP, but it didnâ€™t work. When I tried to uninstall the old version, the server crashed and could not be restarted due to an error called â€œkernel panicâ€.
Iâ€™ve done my best to fix it myself until midnight. Itâ€™s useless. I could only ask other people for help. The technical staff couldnâ€™t solve it either, but they helped me to backup the data. Itâ€™s a very tedious experience and I could restore my server after several days. Finally, I used the backup data and restored my website.

item.title: Twenty books
item.description:
Until today I finished reading 20 books written in English.
Twenty books is not a lot, but itâ€™s a big step for me.
Itâ€™s a good accomplishment.
Just keep going.

item.title: EP 8 Real wealth
item.description:
Wealth is usually considered to be money. But in my opinion, true wealth does not only contain money. It can contain many things, such as health, wisdom, and experience.
An essential part of wealth is health. We inherited our health from our ancestors when we were born. Itâ€™s innate and priceless. But we can partially change it. We can destroy health, but we can also increase it.
Another part of wealth is wisdom. Although our health can be inherited, we canâ€™t inherit wisdom. Through learning, reading, and education, we can gradually get wisdom. Everyone has their own wisdom. Itâ€™s also priceless in different peopleâ€™s lives.
Finally, experience is also a part of wealth. Good experience is wealth, and bad experience is a kind of debt. But whether it is good or bad, whether it is a wealth or a liability, all depends on how you look at yourself. Everybody has unique experiences. If we can get more experience, we might be able to handle challenges more easily in the future.

item.title: Complicate physical activities
item.description:
In my opinion, simple physical activities are not enough to improve mental health.
As human beings, we get used to coordinate with our mind and body. Repeated and easy activities are boring. If the activities are more complicated, itâ€™s better for our mentality. We can also combine different activities.

item.title: EP 7 Practice
item.description:
Practice is one of the most important things in our life.
In order to gain our skill or improve our ability, we all need to have enough practice.
Practice is repeated action. Enough times of repetition is necessary in our life. If we do a lot of practice, we will definitely get some improvements unconsciously.

In most cases, the beginning of the practice is very difficult. We think itâ€™s hard, itâ€™s a big challenge. We may have tried many times, but there are still no results at all. We want to give up. But if we continue and persevere, as the times of practice increase, our improvement will be faster and faster. This is a phenomenon that shows up in many areas. The problem is that we give up so easily.

item.title: Loop Habits Tracker
item.description: Maybe I can use plain text instead of software to track my habits.

item.title: EP 6 Plain text
item.description:
I have used a lot of software to store my notes and data. But gradually I found that although these softwares are very convenient and they offer a lot of good services. They also caused me a lot of trouble in the long run.
One important reason is that you cannot export your data freely. I tried a lot of softwares after I decided to write online. Many of them donâ€™t provide good export service. Your files can only be exported to some special formats. Whatâ€™s more, these files can only be viewed in some special forms. We can probably convert them to other formats we want, but itâ€™s not that easy.
Another reason is that I realized that some tools and services could give you a lot of convenience and unique features, but when you get used to it. You are also limited by these tools. Your choice would be less, and itâ€™s also very inconvenient if you want to change your tool. Especially for a person who is always curious about new tools. Technology is a double-edged sword. I always want to find a suitable tool for writing, learning, productivity, etc. But the result is not so good.

item.title: Automated system
item.description:
Creating an effective and automated system is very important.
I always look at the tools. But any tools should be built on a good system. Tools are medium. I must know how to use these tools.
With an effective and stable system, you donâ€™t even need a tool with high technology.

item.title: EP 5 Thirteen years of journaling
item.description:
Iâ€™ve been journaling for thirteen years.
I started journaling in April 2010.

Itâ€™s one of the most important habits in my life.
Before 2016, I wrote journals on paper. After 2016, I started to write on app. Itâ€™s very convenient to write digitally. After December 2017, I started writing in English.

I became aware that journals are the history of my own life.
Now I have the intention to collect all my journals and publish them in a book. I think it would be very interesting to browse through my whole life.
Looking back to my childhood, I realized that I already have the talent to collect the materials in different periods and save them in order. I enjoyed that kind of feeling.

item.title: Reading the first five books of the Bible
item.description:
After almost a year of intermittent reading, I have finally finished the first five books of the Old Testament. The first five books are also called the books of Moses.
I suddenly realized that probably seventy percent of the Bible is the Old Testament. Only a small part of it is the New Testament. The Old Testament is written in Hebrew, and the New Testament is written in Greek.

There are some stories that impressed me a lot. Killing and punishment may be the theme during the time of Moses. There is a city called Sodom, which is a city that indulges in lust and sin. People run away before Yahweh destroys this city completely. But the people who turned their heads and looked back at Sodom, still became pillars of salt.
Moses and the generation of Israel living in Egypt ran away from it, all could not see the land promised by God. Only they all died, later generations can start the journey and see the land.

item.title: EP 4 AI tool for learning
item.description:
Iâ€™m Qiran. Today, I would like to share with you my understanding of Artificial Intelligence.

I gradually realized that AI has already entered my life. Some people may think that AI is very destructive to the lives of ordinary people. But in my opinion, the most distinct characteristic that humans possess and surpass other creatures is the ability to use tools. AI is a very useful tool now, and it would be highly beneficial if we can learn to use it effectively.

item.title: Stickers
item.description: Why do I no longer use stickers? For me, the use of stickers distorts the understanding of others. I donâ€™t think itâ€™s an effective or appropriate way to communicate with others online. The Internet is already full of entertaining and useless information. Using stickers will make this situation worse. Using words is enough to convey accurate information. Although without stickers, some people will think that it will feel that there is no emotion. But the truth is that the Internet cannot emulate the real conversation. Calling and talking face to face may be a better way for communication.

item.title: EP 3 Feel the fear
item.description:
Hi, Iâ€™m Qiran. Today I would like to share with you my understanding of fear.

Fear is one of the basic human emotions. We all have fears. As for me, fear is one of my biggest difficulties in life.

There are different kinds of fear.
The first fear of myself is the fear of being disappointed by others. In terms of human relationships, Iâ€™m really an infant now. I am afraid of falling.
I always avoid dealing with others, just like an infant avoids learning to walk. But if I never fall down, I cannot learn to walk forever.
I knew I had to accept disappointments. Maybe Iâ€™m able to collect them in order to develop my abilities. I donâ€™t have to take them personally. Disappointments are actually assets.

item.title: Why donâ€™t lie
item.description:
When we were kids, elders always tell us not to lie. But most of us lie because we are afraid of the consequences after telling the truths. As a child, lying is a good protection.Â 

Itâ€™s always a bad habit to lie to yourself or to other people.

Lying can distort our understanding of reality. When we lie to ourselves, at first we think we can avoid the difficulties or solve some problems. But we will gradually lose the ability to face the real world.

item.title: EP 2 The tree of habits
item.description:
Hi, Iâ€™m Qiran. Today I would like to share with you some of my understanding about habits.
In my life, the concept of cultivating habits is gradually becoming one of the most important parts.

In my opinion, habit is a compound interest. The fruits or effects of habits will grow faster and faster in the long run.

For me, one of the examples of daily habit is writing journals. Maybe itâ€™s my longest habit, which started from my middle school time. Now it has become my important habit that records my life.

item.title: EP-01 Why I start my podcast
item.description:
Hello everyone. Iâ€™m Qiran. This is the first episode of my podcast. Todayâ€™s topic is that, I want to share reasons about why I start my podcast.

The first reason is, itâ€™s a place of sharing my thoughts and my understanding covering a lot of topics. Itâ€™s an opportunity to exchange ideas with others, maybe I can meet new friends and learn a lot from others in the future.

Second, I think I can cover a lot of topics that Iâ€™m interested in. Forcing myself to write something is a good habit to learn, and itâ€™ll also help me improve my thinking.

item.title: How Your Habits Shape Your Identity (and Vice Versa)
item.description:

Identity is the deepest.
â€œIâ€™m not a smokerâ€ is better than â€œI donâ€™t smoke.â€

The system of a dictatorship has a very different set of beliefs like absolute authority and strict obedience. You can imagine many ways to try to get more people to vote in a democracy, but such behavior change would never get off the ground in a dictatorship. Thatâ€™s not the identity of the system. item.title: THE PROCRASTINATOR IN YOUR LIFE
item.description:
MANAGING PEOPLE WHO PROCRASTINATE

Due to procrastination, employees lose their productivities and cause companies billions of dollars lost.

COMMITMENT VS. COMPLIANCE

As a manager, you need to use inviting commitment rather than demands for compliance.

FOCUSING ON STARTING VS. FINISHING

Effective managers always have the ability to communicate with their employees. Focusing on starting is much more effective for a perfectionist.

GETTING RESULTS OR GIVING CRITICISM

You need to give praise instead of criticism for employees. Praise even needs to precede the recommendations for improvement.
State Your Priorities Clearly
Donâ€™t change your priority too often.
Be Decisive
You need to be decisive and donâ€™t change the goal during the project. When you choose one, donâ€™t change it.
Be Fair and Frequent in Your Rewards

LIVING WITH A PROCRASTINATOR
Maybe you are living with a procrastinator, you didnâ€™t need to put commands do them, just sayÂ I wouldÂ instead ofÂ you should.
A LAST WORD
Go ahead! Donâ€™t sayÂ Iâ€™ll tryÂ orÂ itâ€™s not working,Â just be open-minded and do it!

item.title: FINE-TUNING YOUR PROGRESS
item.description:

You can try to plan procrastination when you meet a big project, and record your self-statement, these statements may be your old pattern.

RESILIENCE AND HARDINESS

Resilience
Resilience is very important when you fail, every time you fail you can bounce back from it and know your performance isnâ€™t your self-worth, but your performance is connected to your perseverance. You donâ€™t need to be responsible for what had happened to you, but you need to be responsible for how to tackle these problems. Sarahâ€™s experience told us that you will meet some obstacles placed by others, but you donâ€™t need to put these pressure on yourself, you just need to set a time for yourself and see how much you can finish.

item.title: What Kills Me Makes Others Stronger
item.description:
Antifragility by layers

Some parts on the inside of a system may be required to be fragile in order to make the system antifragile as a result. All restaurants are combating with each other in order to form the antifragility of the whole group. If a single restaurant is too robust when the crisis happens, all reasons are boil down to the fragile of this restaurant.

Evolution and Unpredictability

Nature (and nature-like systems) likes diversity between organisms rather than diversity within an immortal organismâ€¦
Evolutions benefits from the randomness but the unit died from the harms.
So I need to build some new systems different than the habit system, such as an energy managing system or log system.

item.title: Holding Hands in the Dark
item.description:
This is a love story between two teenagers, Mi-ran and Jun-Sang, although it happened in the most totalitarian country in the worldâ€“North Korea.

Mi-ran is a girl, her father is a miner, Jun-Sang is a student belongs to a family at a high level.

In the 1990s, the countryâ€™s economy broke down, and there is not enough electric power to keep the night be lighten, but the night in North Korea, itâ€™s more natural and beautiful than other countries, no noises, no neons. Whatâ€™s more, no one can spy the two teenagers, holding hands in the dark.

item.description:
organic and mechanical are different, organisms are antifragile, also for human-beings. But in modern society, humans all live longer but weak, because the environment is so fragile. Unlike natural environment, their working environment, medicine and living quarters all making them weaker and weaker. Unlike mechanicals, organisms will become stronger because of self-repair in some point.

The Complex

The man-made mechanicals are complicated but not complex, If you break them down, they donâ€™t cause a ripple effect. But human society or ecology is complex, if you exterminate a specific animal, you will disrupt a food chain.

item.description:
We live in a world of low-privacy, and we also had an illusion about privacy, so many people said itâ€™s not important to hide my privacy, so many people donâ€™t care. but itâ€™s a choice for yourself as for privacy, if you donâ€™t care, your privacy may be going around the internet, maybe forever.

item.title: Self
item.description:
High levels are abstract. People alway want to go higher level thinking.

Shifting to low levels has two benefits, the first is people can avoid the control of high levels, the second is, people escape from strong emotions like anxiety.

People usually change between high levels and low levels.

Self-awareness can occurs at different levels, at low levels, like pain and movement.

Self-worth is very important if they cannot justify their actions and feel progress for their goals, self-worth will be very low.

item.description:
CREATING SAFETY: THE FIRST MAJOR STEP OUT OF PROCRASTINATION

item.title: Loneliness
item.description:
The author got some experiences which saw so many disabilities, they full of loneliness, painful.

A human being needs a companion, and we need truths and make our worlds or communities better.

Community and Rigid Order

This is a paradox between the desire to belong, to fit in a community and to serve the deepest mind for oneself, close to God and be freedom.

The Weakness of a Child

We all born with weakness, we need love from parents as we cannot survive without others help. So if we donâ€™t get love from the outside world, we will feel lonely. A lonely child will construct protection to survive and close his heart, but a child who gets love will more open to the world. we all have a lonely child in our heart, a lonely child can make us survive but also can destruct us.

item.title: Category
item.description:
The most important decision youâ€™ll ever make: Change your categories.

A lack of willingness to change your categories is dogmatic, and your categories become chains that restrict your growth. On the other hand, your categories may change so wildly that they become meaningless and without something to anchor you, you fall into an endless abyss.

Perhaps, the most important category youâ€™ll construct is one of yourself.

Every category you impose one the world is one that you also impose on yourself and you decide if you do or donâ€™t fit into that category.
These days I started listening the podcast, A.J. Hoge is very good, his talking is understandable and knowledgable.

item.title: Notes: The Now Habit (1)
item.description:
Goal: supportive of yourself

The questions about yourself:

  1. Obligation.
  2. Time (vague terms such as â€œsometime next weekâ€ )
  3. Goals and value. (distracted by another plan)
  4. Mood, fear.

Conclusion: Our real distress comes from constant anxiety of delaying.

It is important to notice the healing system. But Why we procrastinate? Because we fear a threat to our independence.

The fear of judgment is the key fear that stems from over-identifying who you are.
